attributes.action: Stop Expenses on a second Home for MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A member of the public who has a job away from home does not have a second home paid for by the company he works for to the exhorbitent expence MP's are Now.

If as a member of the public we have to furnish a second home primarily because we took up a job that meant working away from home we must furnish it completely ourseklves, why should MP's be treated differently (after all they took the job - it was not forced upon them unwillingly)

I petition the Government to abolish Expenses on a second home for MP's and ensure they only have the same rights as members of the public - if they take a job working away from home they should furnish the appartment at their own expense not the taxpayers.

rejection.details:
